title: MBMBaM 501: Face 2 Face: Jeans-Washed Acid
description: We’re currently sailing the high seas, searching for adventure on that big blue horizon. So, while we do that, here’s a live show we recently did in Cincinnati. (Griffin's doing fine, by the way. You'll understand why you might want that update a few minutes into the episode.)
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Justin McElroy, Griffin McElroy, Travis McElroy)
